description: [Pikabot Distribution February 2024](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0036) distributed [Pikabot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1145) for initial access purposes in February 2024.(Citation: Elastic Pikabot 2024)(Citation: Zscaler Pikabot 2024)

external_references.description: Daniel Stepanic & Salim Bitam. (2024, February 23). PIKABOT, I choose you!. Retrieved July 12, 2024.
Nikolaos Pantazopoulos. (2024, February 12). The (D)Evolution of Pikabot. Retrieved July 17, 2024.
